title: "AI Search Art"
content:
Welcome to our website! üéâ

We are a minimalist and modern website that features an abstract illustration of an AI-powered search engine as our main wallpaper. Our website is designed with simplicity in mind, allowing users to easily navigate and find what they are looking for.

Our focus is on providing a seamless search experience powered by AI technology. With our intelligent search engine, you can quickly find the information you need without having to sift through endless pages of results. We believe that technology should work for you, not against you, which is why we have created a platform that is intuitive and user-friendly.

Whether you're searching for the latest news, researching a topic, or simply browsing the web, our website is the perfect place to start. So why wait? Start exploring today and see how our AI-powered search engine can make your life easier! üíªüîç

prompts.title:
Write me short (max 3 words) title for website with main wallpaper that is:

"A wallpaper featuring an abstract illustration of an AI-powered search engine, with a minimalist and modern design."

The title should not be 1:1 copy of the prompt but rather a short description of the website which is using this wallpaper.
prompts.content:
Write me some content for this website in markdown format.
The content should be a short description of the website which is using this wallpaper.

- You can include UTF-8 emojis
- You can use formatting like **bold** or _italic_
- Do not describe the wallpaper itself, but rather the website which is using it.
- Do not start with any title - title will be included automatically
- Do not include links
- Do not include images
